channel.title: developer on Python courses mentor blog <relaunch>.
channel.description: Recent content in developer on Python courses mentor blog <relaunch>.

item.title: Moscow Python Conf++ 2018 video report.
item.description: Yes, the Moscow Python Conf++ 2018 conference was awesome. Started so many acquaintances with the pythonists who make impact in the software world! I got into picture at the stand of Moscow.Python on 1:50. I will come to the next one too! Mixed russian and english content, you are welcome to watch!

item.title: Review of Kevlin Henney`s talk Seven Ineffective Coding Habits of Many Programmers
item.description:
Review of Kevlin Henney`s talk Seven Ineffective Coding Habits of Many Programmers

I watched this video from the start till the end. I see this coding habits very often. I fought unsustainable spacing the wrong way in the past.

item.title: A foreword from the author.
item.description: First of all I would like to thank one person for reasoning me to start a developer blog. This person is John Sonmez, the author of the email course on creating a blog that boosts your career “How to Create a Blog That BOOSTS Your Career” and the founder of the Simple Programmer. In this blog I plan to teach my reader step by step how to tackle tasks of the machine learnig in the computer vision using Python tools.
